transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, namaskar. Mai A.S. Trading Chhattisgarh Raipur se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ha sir boliye.
Executive: A, ek hamare catalog me vermi compost ka jo rate hai.
Customer: 
Executive: Wo rate ko thoda change karna tha.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Isliye kyuki baki logo ka jo rate hai usse mera rate thoda high lag raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Isliye inquiry vagarah kafi kam aa rahe hai hamare paas.
Executive: Sir abhi to maafi chahunga ye subah ho payega kam to koi dikkat.
Customer: Nahi subah bhi hone se koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Ek jankari aur denge aapko call ek baar me.
Customer: Ha bataye bilkul.
Executive: A, vermi compost ka rate apna Chhattisgarh ke jo bhi partiyo ka hai.
Customer: 
Executive: Unka ek average rate chahenge.
Executive: Sir ye bhi mai bata dunga subah.
Customer: Subah batayenge na?
Executive: Ye bhi subah hi bata paunga subah ha mai bata dunga.
Executive: Ye to aap vaise bhi khud bhi dekh sakte hai.
Customer: Mai wohi dekh raha hu.
Customer: Mai wohi dekh raha hu.
Executive: A mujhe office kitne baje khulta hai aap logo ka?
Executive: Sir 9:00 khul jata hai par kaam vaam chalu 10:00 baje tak hota hai.
Customer: 10:00 baje.
Customer: Wohi 11:00 baje kareeb phone karna sahi?
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek, theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change vermi compost rate in catalog.

- Feels his rate is higher than competitors.

- Wants average vermi compost rate of Chhattisgarh parties.



Resolution:

- Executive said the rate change can be done tomorrow.

- Executive will provide average rate tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- rate change, vermi compost, catalog
